title: 7 guests injured after tree branch fell on them at San Antonio Zoo
description: Seven people were sent to the hospital after a tree branch fell on them at a zoo in Texas, according to the San Antonio Fire Department.

title: VA social worker sentenced to lying about military service, collecting benefits
description: She posed as a Purple Heart recipient and scammed veterans groups.

title: 'What You Won't Do for Love' singer Bobby Caldwell dies
description: R&B singer Bobby Caldwell, who had a major hit in 1978 with “What You Won’t Do For Love," has died

title: WATCH:  This dog’s reaction to rain gives us so much joy
description: Melody Peng was walking her neighbor's dog near her home in Redondo Beach, California, when she captured his excited reaction.

title: WATCH:  Magpies annoy panda by plucking her hair to warm their nests
description: Female giant panda Zheng Zheng was enjoying a relaxing day in the sun at the Qinling Giant Panda Research Center in China -- until magpies teamed up to pluck her hair for nesting.

title: No clear association between Paxlovid and COVID-19 rebound, FDA says
description: An FDA analysis did not find a clear association between the COVID-19 antiviral drug Paxlovid and illness rebound, the FDA said in a new report.

title: NBA suspends Ja Morant 8 games for video showing gun in club
description: The NBA has suspended Memphis Grizzlies guard Ja Morant eight games without pay after determining that his holding a firearm at a club in suburban Denver earlier this month was “conduct detrimental to the league.”

title: Suspect crashes helicopter after trying to steal it from airport: Police
description: Authorities are looking for a person who crashed a helicopter after trying to steal it from Sacramento Executive Airport in California early Wednesday.

title: Garcetti confirmed as India ambassador after 20-month fight
description: The Senate has confirmed former Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti as the next ambassador to India, 20 months after he was initially selected for the post

title: What to know about the Trump-era rollback of bank rules and SVB's demise
description: Experts told ABC News regulators missed "red flags" before the collapse.

title: NASCAR issues largest team fine in history against Hendrick
description: NASCAR has levied the largest combined fine on one team in series history

title: Workers dismantle Florida ride where teen fell to death
description: Almost a year after a Missouri teen fell to his death, a 400-foot (122 meter) amusement ride was being dismantled this week in central Florida’s tourism corridor

title: Man defaced NYC's Charging Bull statue with antisemitic symbols: Police
description: A Colorado man was indicted on hate crime charges for allegedly defacing public spaces in New York City with Nazi symbols and racial slurs.

title: Rodgers says he intends to play for Jets this coming season
description: Aaron Rodgers says he intends to play for the New York Jets in the coming season as the four-time NFL MVP quarterback waits for the Green Bay Packers to trade him

title: 2 dead in shooting at airport hotel: Police
description: Two people are dead after a shooting at a hotel in Portland, Oregon, police said.

title: Texas announces takeover of Houston schools, stirring anger
description: Texas officials have announced a takeover of Houston’s nearly 200,000-student school district

title: Reality star Todd Chrisley's son Kyle charged with assault
description: Authorities say the son of reality TV star Todd Chrisley has been charged with aggravated assault in Tennessee

title: Experts call cryptocurrency a 'bystander' in SVB, Signature Bank collapses
description: Unlike last year's collapse of FTX, cryptocurrency did not play a leading role in the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank, experts tell  ABC News.

title: 7 deputies charged with murder in death of inmate
description: Seven Virginia sheriff's deputies have been arrested and charged with second-degree murder in the death of inmate Irvo Otieno.

title: Iran says 110 arrested over suspected schoolgirl poisonings
description: Iranian police say 110 suspects have been arrested in connection with the suspected poisoning of thousands of girls in schools across the country

title: Bank stocks tumble amid Silicon Valley Bank turmoil
description: Shares of Credit Suisse fell more than 26% in early trading on Wednesday amid fallout from Silicon Valley Bank collapse.

title: German investigators take down crypto money laundering site
description: German investigators say they have taken down a major online money laundering operation, seizing the Germany-based server infrastructure of a platform that dealt in ill-gotten cryptocurrency

title: Wisconsin man pleads guilty to role in Whitmer kidnap scheme
description: A Wisconsin man who was accused of a secondary role in a plot to kidnap Michigan’s governor has pleaded guilty to a lesser charge

title: T-Mobile acquires Mint, partially owned by Ryan Reynolds
description: T-Mobile will acquire Mint Mobile, partly owned by actor Ryan Reynolds, as part of a cash-and-stock deal worth as much as $1.35 billion

title: Exiled Chinese billionaire, an ally of Steve Bannon, arrested by FBI
description: Guo Wengui, an exiled Chinese billionaire with business ties to Steve Bannon, has been arrested on federal charges out of New York.

title: Man who went missing found with head severed, attorney says
description: The family of a Mississippi man, that was found dead and dismembered according to an autopsy, is calling for a federal investigation.

title: Experts say attacks on free speech are rising across the US
description: First Amendment experts say attacks on free speech rights are escalating across the United States

title: Credit Suisse shares sink as key investor vows no more help
description: Battered shares of the Swiss bank lost more than one-quarter of their value.

title: 2 Americans appealing convictions for Italian police slaying
description: Italy’s highest court is hearing a final appeal of two U.S. citizens convicted in the stabbing death of a police officer during a plainclothes operation in Rome in the summer of 2019

title: WATCH:  Snow caves in roof of Minnesota mall
description: Part of the roof caved in at a mall in Duluth, Minnesota, amid heavy snowfall. No injuries were reported.

title: Boat carrying migrants from Madagascar sinks; 34 drown
description: Officials in Madagascar have recovered 34 bodies from the Indian Ocean after the sinking of a boat carrying migrants hoping to get to Mayotte

title: US wholesale inflation fell last month on lower food costs
description: Wholesale price increases in the United States slowed sharply last month as food costs declined, a sign that inflationary pressures may be easing

title: Texas judge asks lawyers to keep quiet on key hearing on abortion medication
description: The unusual move by Judge Matthew Kacsmaryk could limit public understanding of a case about whether regulators had the right to approve abortion medication mifepristone

title: Honda recalling 500,000 vehicles to fix seat belt problem
description: Honda is recalling a half-million vehicles in the U.S. and Canada because the front seat belts may not latch properly

title: Following 'uptick' in airplane close calls, FAA to hold safety summit
description: Following a series of close calls, aviation leaders are set to meet Wednesday to discuss the incidents and identify key patterns and risk factors.

title: Massive seaweed bloom headed to Florida is a mystery to scientists
description: A massive seaweed bloom headed to Florida and the Gulf of Mexico is poised to potentially harm beaches and tourism by emitting stinky gas.

title: Suspect in custody after 4 fatally shot at 2 homes in Alabama
description: Four people are dead after a gunman opened fire at two homes in the Birmingham, Alabama, area, authorities said.

title: 'Rust' special prosecutor announces she will step down from case
description: Andrea Reeb, the special prosecutor who investigated the fatal shooting of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins on the set of "Rust," announced Tuesday she is stepping down.
